    public class Chess
extends java.applet.Applet
    View class which extends Applet to display the user interface.

      void squaresAttacked()
      this determines the squares attacked pieces 0 - 15 = black; pieces 16 - 31 = white 0 - square not attacked 1 - square attacked by white 2 - square attacked by black 3 - square attacked by both
